bwwExcerpt: "But if Hodge has some beautifully nuanced  moments, he can  also milk Zaza's camp value, and that of the show, to  distraction. And Kelsey  Grammer's  Georges can be a too-willing accomplice. Breathlessly  hamming it up  through some of the early scenes, Grammer almost seems to  be vying to  beat Zaza at her own game."
